title: Chocolate mess cupcakes
ingredients: ['100g self-raising flour', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder', '125g butter, softened', '125g caster sugar', '2 large eggs', '2 to 3 tablespoons milk', '50g chocolate chips', 'For the topping', '200g dark chocolate', '25g butter', '2 teaspoons double cream', 'grated milk chocolate, to decorate']
